description:
Individual tab component. Only meant to be used within the
TabNav wrapper component

children.description: Text or element that appears within the component

isActive.description: Should the `TabNav.Tab` visually appear to be active

isDisabled.description: Boolean for whether the tab should be given the disabled class

onClick.description: Function to perform when tab is clicked

tabId.description: String to identify tab, used in conjunction with activeTab
